title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 25.3 - Monthly reports to division of dairy industry services
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 25.3 - Monthly reports to division of dairy industry services

State Regulations
(a) On or before the 15th day of each month, each milk dealer operating a bulk tank unit shall file, for each such bulk tank
unit, an accurate report of the previous month's operation. On or before the
15th day of each month, each milk dealer operating a milk plant that receives
more than 600,000 lbs. of milk and/or milk products, yearly, for processing or
manufacture, shall file, for each such plant, an accurate report of the
previous month's operation. Each such report shall be filed with the Division
of Dairy Industry Services on forms provided by such division. (b) In addition to the report required
pursuant to subdivision (a) of this section, each milk dealer purchasing milk
from producers shall, on or before the 28th day of each month, file a report of
payments to producers relating to milk purchased during the preceding month. Each cooperative shall likewise file a report of payments to producers each
month for each plant or bulk tank unit it operates and for its producer-members
which the cooperative directs to the plant or bulk tank unit of another milk
dealer. All such reports shall be filed with the Division of Dairy Industry

Services on forms provided by such division. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1

25.3

Amended

New

York State Register August 29, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 35, eff. 8/29/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
